title: Twisted Treeline
body: Oh man Twisted Treeline is being neglected time after time. All Riot wants to do is give up when they expect something big after putting little work into it. The link is an image to ticket I sent after Riot announced the first shut down to Twisted Treeline. It's really sad to see a great game mode go just because they get more money by putting more devs into tft and making more little legends. anyway I guess my rant is over, goodbye Twisted Treeline. :(
